title: Bug 4121: JarExporter causes out of Sync (1GILQD5)
description: Bug 4121: JarExporter causes out of Sync (1GILQD5)
OB: When exporting a directory (project) and placing the exported jar in the same directory (project), an out of sync message is displayed when overwriting the exported jar file for the second time.
EB: The exported jar file should not cause an out of sync message when overwritten in the same directory (project).
SR:
To reproduce the issue:
1. Open the software
2. Select a directory (project) to export
3. Export the directory as a jar file
4. Place the exported jar file in the same directory (project)
5. Overwrite the exported jar file
6. Observe the out of sync message
